description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 10/09/2006

Brooke tells Ridge that she has left Nick for good. Nick calls, but Brooke refuses to talk to him so Ridge picks up and tells Nick to stay away from Brooke. Donna tries to convince Brooke and Ridge not to get involved with each other again, but they ask her to leave so they can have a moment alone. Later, Nick arrives and Ridge tries to get him to leave. Nick tells Brooke that he is not the father of Bridget’s baby. Ridge is shocked when he hears that Nick had cheated. Stephanie tells Donna that Ridge never wanted to be with her because he wants Brooke. Stephanie blocks Donna from returning to the guest house and wants to know what is going on inside. Eric comforts Bridget after she confesses to him that she is pregnant with Dante’s baby.
